title: Green Slime
summaries: Green Slimes are the weakest of all slimes, and are also one of the most common ones to encounter. As Green Slimes spawn commonly in the Forest during the daytime, they are likely the first enemy a player will come across in a new world. Green Slimes will not target the player under usual circumstances, but will become aggressive when damaged, during the night, or if brought underground.
Like most other slimes, the Green Slime will be passive towards any player with the Royal Gel accessory equipped.

On <linked>[img:Desktop version]</linked><linked> Desktop</linked>, <linked>[img:Console version]</linked><linked> Console</linked>, <linked>[img:Mobile version]</linked><linked> Mobile</linked>, <linked>3DS</linked><linked>[img:Nintendo 3DS version]</linked>, and <linked>[img:Legacy tModLoader version]</linked><linked> Legacy tModLoader</linked>, they can rarely be found carrying <linked>bonus drops</linked>, which the player receives upon the slime's death.
